title: Is it legal to use voicepacks ?
body: Or am i gonna get banned for ***3rd party programs*** cause i kinda want the KR voiceovers

replies.body: So far they seem OK, but they might add on any moment additional illegal features that might or might not result into a ban. As always, do so at your risk and always double check the content of what you add and what gets added with an update.
in other words fk it. already got one acc banned no need to get another one now that i finally reformed lul
I never got banned but the hell i risk for this, too >_>

We don't support third party programs or modifications, and using it would be at your own risk.  We don't know what other content might be hidden, which could potentially cause you trouble or unfair competitive advantages.  We recently created an article that goes over our [stance on 3rd parties](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848).  I hope that helps clear things up!
